Sentencas: Fuel cells are one of the technologies available for combined heat, cooling and power production (CHCP) systems.
Titulo: Design of a trigeneration system using a high-temperature fuel cell

Sentencas: They offer several advantages over more conventional systems, but they still need to overcome a number of barriers until they are readily available for commercialization.
Titulo: Design of a trigeneration system using a high-temperature fuel cell

Sentencas: At this stage, it is important to fund demonstration projects that experiment with fuel cell technology in pre-commercial situations.
Titulo: Design of a trigeneration system using a high-temperature fuel cell

Sentencas: In this context, a CHCP system, using a high-temperature fuel cell (solid oxide fuel cells, SOFC) and an absorption chiller, was designed in order to meet the energetic demands of a hospital for electricity, cooling, heating and hot water.
Titulo: Design of a trigeneration system using a high-temperature fuel cell

Sentencas: The hospital load profile was determined taking into consideration the hourly energy consumption for four different typical clays in the year.
Titulo: Design of a trigeneration system using a high-temperature fuel cell

Sentencas: The CHCP system was designed so that the fuel cell meets the electrical demand of the hospital and, since the SOFC did not produce enough thermal energy, a boiler was considered.
Titulo: Design of a trigeneration system using a high-temperature fuel cell

Sentencas: The artificial thermal efficiency of the CHCP system is 68%.
Titulo: Design of a trigeneration system using a high-temperature fuel cell

Sentencas: The investment analysis is presented and it is concluded that, at the present and at three other scenarios, the system is not financially feasible.
Titulo: Design of a trigeneration system using a high-temperature fuel cell

Sentencas: Despite this conclusion, it is important to invest on demonstration projects to help fuel cells reach commercialization.
Titulo: Design of a trigeneration system using a high-temperature fuel cell
